sections.summary: experienced electronic technician with extensive knowledge in a/c and d/c theory and troubleshooting skills and technique. avionics specialist in theory of operation and repairs. highlights ac/dc power and control systems excellent written and verbal communication skills electro-mechanical proficiency superior troubleshooting skills digital circuitry test equipment operation branch circuit wiring diagnostic testing sub-panel installation accomplishments electrical wiring â worked to meet current faa electrical codes and company guidelines. installed wiring and electrical appliances for commercial and military aircraft with a 40% ahead-of-schedule rate. scheduled and tracked all repairs. supervised team of three staff members. mounted assembled components on circuit board at a rate of 100 per shift. served as an expert in troubleshooting and repairing state-of-the-art electrical and electronic systems.
